ABOUT US

VANSH OVERSEAS LIMITED was created with a dream to become one of leading India’s premier cutlery storage product suppliers. Established in the year 1984, since then it has got an extraordinary position in the kitchen and bar accessories world and its success is based on delivering cost-effective, design-led resolutions tailored to suit customers’ exact needs.

Our product range

We offer a wide range of Dinnerware, Serveware & Storage, Cutlery, Cookware, Bar Accessories, Champagne Bucket Stand, Champagne Bowl, Cocktail Shaker, Double Walled Wine Cooler Glass Ash Tray and many more products.

Our establishment and strength

Established in the year 1984 working under the supervision of Mr Shivam Soni our supervisor. We have progressively developed into a truly expert company by financing in a dedicated & qualified team of specialists from many fields of industry.

Our specialist

We are privileged by our excellent name for reliability and service which are insistent by our modest pricing, quality product, quick reply & on-time delivery. It is then, stress-free for us to lodge any exact requirements of the customers expertly.

Why Us?

Modest pricing is based on continuous growth, value engineering & economic practices.

  • The resistance of batch & bulk production.
  • Rapid reply time & very modest development cost.
  • Timely delivery across the country
